1370: Kerolus moved to Bloemendaelse straet.C.4 after marriage.
Got married to Sarre at age 33 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Sarre, Sarre, at age 33.
1371: Had a son with Sarre, Ghisebrecht, at age 34.
1374: Had a son with Sarre, Everyng, at age 37.
Lost son Everyng when Everyng was 1 years old.
1375: Had a daughter with Sarre, Amalburga, at age 38.
1376: Had a daughter with Sarre, Sophia, at age 39.
1380: Had a daughter with Sarre, Ermegardis, at age 43.
1382: Had a daughter with Sarre, Atghardis, at age 45.
Lost daughter Amalburga when Amalburga was 8 years old.
